# inventory Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-23

## Active Technologies
- SQLite database with Sequelize ORM, foreign key constraints enabled (003-dashboard-improvements)

- TypeScript 5.x (Frontend), Node.js 18+ (Backend) + React 18, Vite, TailwindCSS 3.x (Frontend); Express.js, SQLite3, multer (Backend) (002-item-ui-enhancements)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5.x (Frontend), Node.js 18+ (Backend): Follow standard conventions
